contents: Article 23 (Judgment Decision) ① The referee shall make a decision in accordance with the following items. 1. Work must be performed fairly and independently from external organizations. 2. You must comply with the referee-related regulations, the regulations of the relevant organization, and the referee regulations, and do your best to make a clear decision in accordance with the game rules. 3. In the management and judging of games, decisions are made fairly and according to conscience. ② The referee has the authority to make decisions on the interpretation and application of game rules during the game. ③ After the game ends, the referee must check the official game records, etc. with the scorer, prepare a game report according to the relevant group form, and submit it to the referee committee. ④ Member sports organizations must specify in the competition outline the obligation to re-read videos and store videos for at least three years during domestic comprehensive competitions and national competitions. ⑤ Objections and appeals against decisions shall be made in accordance with the regulations of the International Federation and the relevant organizations.
